alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lake and central Flathead Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woods Bay, or 16 miles north of Polson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woods Bay, Swan Lake, and Bigfork. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 70 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region
